parentUnit: C’tan Shard Of The Void Dragon
lore: Shards of the Void Dragon fill the air around them with a searing scream of distorted static. With a gesture they can unmake the war engines of the lesser races, dragging the resultant disintegrating matter into themselves like the gravity well of a black hole and using it to replenish their own, ever flickering forms.
keywords: c’tan shard of the void dragon

otherAbilities.Matter Absorption:: At the start of your Shooting phase , select one enemy VEHICLE unit within 12" of this model and roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds and this model regains up to that many lost wounds.
otherAbilities.Necrodermis:: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, halve the Damage characteristic of that attack.
